text: (avarkal virumpiyavaru) vanavarkalai avarkal kanum nalil, ikkurravalikalai nokki ‘‘inraiya tinam (unkalukku alivait tavira) veru oru nalla ceytiyum illai'' enru (avvanavarkal) kuruvarkal. (Akkurravalikalo tankalai alikka varum avvanavarkalait) ‘‘tatuttuk kollunkal; tatuttuk kollunkal'' enru captamituvarkal
